• Step 6 - Create a New Account

    The ultimate goal of the Onboarding Customer Journey is to have visitors register for a new account.

    The final step of the initial Marketing Automation plan is to send them an email about registration. If the visitor does create a new account, then the following will occur:
    • A registration confirmation email is sent
    • The contact is placed in a new Marketing Automation plan named "New Account Registration" to nurture new registrants.
